localSCR 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Classic SCR models: continuous state-space and marked individuals
    • Discrete SCR models: discrete state-space and marked individuals
    • Mark-resight models: continuous state-space with both marked and unmarked individuals
    • Spatial count models: continuous state-space and unmarked individuals

    Reference

    All functions

    customize_model()

    Efficiently edit rows of model code generated from nimble

    discretize_classic()

    Discretize traps and initial activity centers

    get_classic()

    Retrieve nimbleCode for spatial capture-recapture models

    get_discrete()

    Retrieve nimbleCode for discrete spatial capture-recapture models

    get_unmarked()

    Retrieve nimbleCode for spatial count models

    grid_classic()

    Define state-space for spatial capture-recapture models

    initialize_classic()

    Generate starting locations for activity centers

    localize_classic()

    Prepare classic SCR data components for local modeling approach

    mask_polygon()

    Create habitat mask matrix or array from polygon

    mask_raster()

    Create habitat mask matrix or array from raster

    nimSummary()

    Summarize MCMC chain output from nimble

    print_model()

    Display row indices for model used in 'nimble'

    realized_density()

    Generate realized density surface from MCMC output

    rescale_classic()

    Rescale trap coordinates, grid extent, and starting activity center coordinates

    rescale_local()

    Rescale trap coordinates, individual-level grid extent, and starting activity center coordinates for local SCR approach

    run_classic()

    Run spatial capture-recapture models in nimble using parallel processing

    run_discrete()

    Run discrete spatial capture-recapture models in 'nimble' using parallel processing

    sim_classic()

    Simulate basic spatial capture-recapture data
